Title: Mea Culpa
Plot: Grissom is confronted with new evidence while on the stand of a murder trial of a restaurant owner. This development requires the reopening of the case and Eckley initiates an inquiry into Grissom and his team. The results of the inquiry lead to dramatic changes of the CSI team and the series.
ParentalRatingReason: Violence and content that may disturb
GuestStars: Terry Bozeman, John Lacy, Nana Visitor, Bobby Hosea, Jason Segel, Tina Lifford, Erik Jensen, Jason London
